name: h3
description: The 2025 Marucci Echo Connect DMND Drop 10 Fastpitch Softball Bat is engineered for peak performance, offering a balanced swing feel with a slightly end-loaded design to add momentum for stronger hits. Certified by USSSA 1.20, ISA, WBSC, NSA, and USA Softball (ASA), this bat meets the highest standards for competitive play. Its two-piece composite construction, featuring the MDX MAX Composite Barrel, ensures durability while delivering an ultra-responsive pop and satisfying sound on contact. The Outer-Locking System (OLS) minimizes vibration and enhances stiffness, while the micro-perforated soft-touch grip provides a comfortable swing with extra tack. With its sleek grey, silver, and white colorway, this bat is as stylish as it is powerful. Warranty chevron-down chevron-down chevron-down Warranty A Full Manufacturer's Warranty of 365 Days is included. If a warranty issue arises, our Bat Experts are happy to assist you in reaching the manufacturer to get a fast replacement! Begin Your Claim Here: Start My Warranty Claim
